Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.AssignUnmergedRecordsRequest
    Use UpdateTaskRequest instead of AssignUnmergedRecordsRequest.
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.ClearAssignedUnmergedRecordsRequest
    Use UpdateTaskRequest instead of ClearAssignedUnmergedRecordsRequest
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.GetAssignedRecordsRequest
    Use Task APIs instead. GetTasksRequest
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.GetDependentObjectRequest
    As of 9.0

    As of 9.0

    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.LinkRequest 
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.LinkResponse 
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.PutDependentObjectRequest
    As of 9.0
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.PutDependentObjectResponse
    As of 9.0
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.ReassignRecordsRequest
    Use Task APIs instead. UpdateTaskRequest
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.SearchMatchRequest.addMatchColumn(String)
    Use SearchMatchRequest.addMatchColumnUid(String)
    com.siperian.sif.client.EjbSiperianClient.createTX()
    Since XT. Use EjbSiperianClient.createTX(int) to specify the timeout.
    com.siperian.mrm.workflow.activevos.AvosTaskType.getCreationType()
    Only for castor. Use getCreationTypeEnum instead.
    com.siperian.mrm.workflow.activevos2.AvosTaskType.getCreationType()
    Only for castor. Use getCreationTypeEnum instead.
    com.siperian.mrm.workflow.activevos.AvosTaskType.getDataUpdateType()
    Use getDataUpdateTypeEnum instead.
    com.siperian.mrm.workflow.activevos2.AvosTaskType.getDataUpdateType()
    Use getDataUpdateTypeEnum instead.
    com.siperian.mrm.workflow.activevos.AvosTaskType.getDisplayType()
    Only for castor. Use getDisplayTypeEnum instead.
    com.siperian.mrm.workflow.activevos2.AvosTaskType.getDisplayType()
    Only for castor. Use getDisplayTypeEnum instead.
    com.siperian.sif.message.hm.GetOneHopRequest.getFilterCriteria()
    - will no longer be supported in 10.0, possibly earlier in 9.1
    com.siperian.sif.message.TaskMetaData.getPriority()
    Use getPriorityEnum instead
    com.siperian.sif.message.TaskMetaData.getStatus()
    Use getStatusEnum instead
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.GetTaskLineageRequest.getTaskPosition()
    Use getTaskPositionEnum instead.
    com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.GetTaskLineageRequest.getWorkflowStatus()
    Use getWorkflowStatusEnum instead.
    com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianObjectType.makeUid(SiperianObjectType, String)
    Use of SiperianObjectType.makeUid(String) is preferred.
    com.siperian.sif.message.hm.GetOneHopRequest.setFilterCriteria(String)
    - will no longer be supported in 10.0, possibly earlier in 9.1
